title: FS/FT: Pair of Huggins hands at mouth.
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Pair of Huggins hands at mouth.
posts.post_content:
Have a pair of Huggins hands at mouth available.

$38 for the clipped corner.  Nice card otherwise
$SOLD for complete card. Has various wrinkles.

Will listen to offers.  Prices include shipping. Paypal FF please, or money order with shipping on receipt of payment.

Will also consider trades, let me know what you have.

Thanks!
